QuestData.Title: Rescued from Torment
QuestData.Description:
The Mawsworn are not only killing those they find in the Seeker's Quorum. They are interrogating the survivors.
We should help save those we can. It's possible one of them might have seen the Fatescribe.
QuestData.LogDescription: Rescue $1oa Tortured Attendants in Seeker's Quorum.
QuestData.RewardText: I struggle to believe that not a single attendant has any information on where the Fatescribe might be.
